thread.title: UK Deals: Destiny: The Taken King under £30
thread.title_full: UK Deals: Destiny: The Taken King under £30

author: IGN Staff
title: UK Deals: Destiny: The Taken King under £30
text:
Just Cause 3 (Xbox One) - £34.85 on Simply Games Deals of The Week 
Halo 5 Guardians including Longshot Assault Rifle with Recoil Compensator DLC is £36.85 at ShopTo if you pre-order it . It also includes 10 free paintball tickets which is an added incentive. 
Darksiders 2: Deathinitive Edition for PS4 is £18.49 at Base. This releases in exactly a week. 
FIFA 16 is £29.97 at CDKeys , when you Facebook Like for 5% off code. This is in the form of a digital code which you'll be able to enter via your Xbox One.
